CUSTOMER_VERBATIM: customer states ck horn on the steering wheel only works in the middle on the side it does no work
CORRECTION_VERBATIM: verified customer concern about a horn inop. i followed document 4374183 to diagnose this concern. i monitored scan tool data forthe horn activation while pressing the horn and it was changing intermittently. i then tested circuits 3287 at the steering wheelfor a short and all was ok, i then tested circuit 6051 and ground circuit had no high resistance. i then tested terminal tension onthe steering wheel harness and found loose tension on the horn connection and required a harness replacement i then replaced thesteering wheel harness. after repairs, the vehicle is now honking as designed
steering wheel replacement
